sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Building, GraduationCap, Users, Search, ArrowRight, Shield, CheckCircle, Clock, Award } from 'lucide-react'; type UserType = { id: string; title: string; description: string; icon: React.ComponentType<{ className?: string }>; color: string; iconColor: string; borderColor: string; hoverColor: string; features: string[]; nextStep: 'login' | 'register'; }; type StatType = { icon: React.ComponentType<{ className?: string }>; number: string; label: string; }; const UserTypeSelection: React.FC = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [selectedType, setSelectedType] = useState(null); const stats: StatType[] = [ { icon: Shield, number: '10K+', label: 'Certificates Verified' }, { icon: Users, number: '500+', label: 'Active Institutions' }, { icon: Clock, number: '99.9%', label: 'Uptime' }, { icon: Award, number: '50+', label: 'Government Bodies' } ]; const userTypes: UserType[] = [ { id: 'government', title: 'Admin', description: 'Manage and verify official certificates', icon: Building, color: 'bg-blue-50 text-blue-600', iconColor: 'bg-blue-100', borderColor: 'border-blue-200', hoverColor: 'hover:border-blue-300', features: [ 'Centralized certificate management', 'Real-time fraud detection', 'Compliance monitoring', 'Public trust enhancement' ], nextStep: 'login' }, { id: 'institute', title: 'Institute', description: 'Issue and manage student certificates', icon: GraduationCap, color: 'bg-green-50 text-green-600', iconColor: 'bg-green-100', borderColor: 'border-green-200', hoverColor: 'hover:border-green-300', features: [ 'Digital certificate issuance', 'Student record management', 'Verification analytics', 'Brand reputation protection' ], nextStep: 'register' }, { id: 'student', title: 'Student', description: 'View and share your certificates', icon: Users, color: 'bg-purple-50 text-purple-600', iconColor: 'bg-purple-100', borderColor: 'border-purple-200', hoverColor: 'hover:border-purple-300', features: [ 'Digital wallet for certificates', 'Easy sharing with employers', 'Lifetime access to records', 'Portfolio management' ], nextStep: 'login' }, { id: 'recruiter', title: 'Recruiter/Verifier', description: 'Verify candidate certificates', icon: Search, color: 'bg-orange-50 text-orange-600', iconColor: 'bg-orange-100', borderColor: 'border-orange-200', hoverColor: 'hover:border-orange-300', features: [ 'Instant candidate verification', 'Fraud detection alerts', 'Bulk verification tools', 'Detailed verification reports' ], nextStep: 'register' } ]; const handleUserTypeSelect = (userType: string) => { setSelectedType(userType); }; const handleProceed = (userType: string, nextStep: 'login' | 'register') => { navigate(`/${nextStep}/${userType}`); }; const handleBack = () => { setSelectedType(null); }; const selectedUserType = selectedType ? userTypes.find(type => type.id === selectedType) : null; if (selectedUserType) { return (

{selectedUserType.title}

{selectedUserType.description}

Key Features

    {selectedUserType.features.map((feature, index) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
); } return (

Choose Your User Type

Select your role to access the appropriate features and dashboard.

{userTypes.map((type) => (
handleUserTypeSelect(type.id)} className={`relative p-6 rounded-xl border-2 ${type.borderColor} ${type.hoverColor} bg-white cursor-pointer transition-all duration-200 hover:shadow-lg`} >

{type.title}

{type.description}

Select
))}
{/* Stats Section */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (

{stat.number}

{stat.label}

))}
{/* Process Section */}

How It Works

Choose Your Role

Select from Government, Institute, Student, or Recruiter/Verifier

2

Register or Login

Create your account or sign in with existing credentials

Start Using

{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Get Started?

Choose your user type above to begin your journey with CERTI-TRUST

); }; export default UserTypeSelection;
